verses.name: Numbers 34:7
verses.text: And this shall be your north border: from the great sea ye shall point out for you mount Hor:

verses.name: Numbers 34:8
verses.text: From mount Hor ye shall point out your border unto the entrance of Hamath; and the goings forth of the border shall be to Zedad:

verses.name: Numbers 34:9
verses.text: And the border shall go on to Ziphron, and the goings out of it shall be at Hazar–enan: this shall be your north border.

verses.name: Numbers 34:10
verses.text: And ye shall point out your east border from Hazar–enan to Shepham:
